name: DeepMeditation

”Alexa, open deep meditation”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deep meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Deep Meditation is the Alexa skill that offers guided meditation sessions anytime you need them, helping you reach a state of profound relaxation. With over 10 sessions featuring a variety of voices and calming background sounds, this skill is designed to deeply relax both body and mind.
The duration of meditation sessions can vary from 10, 20 and 30 minutes.

With the Pro Features you will access to:

• Meditations guided by professional voices
• A range of background sounds perfect for deeper meditation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Continuously updated meditation paths
• Access to all available durations of meditations


We look forward to your feedback to help us improve and provide the best deep meditation experience.

Enjoy your journey into deep relaxation!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
